body_html: I think this is a good idea in principle (looks like it was an oversight that we didn't do that earlier when we introduced the dtype classes) as long as we have some confidence that the automatic conversion logic for dtypes means this won't break users. My expectation is that not many users are using this API (main exception would be a few gradient functions, but those are being moved to C++ anyway), so there is likely very little breakage introduced.
